private_information: I specialize in normalizing action semantics into preconditions and add/delete effects
I do not emit PDDL; I only produce a clean, machine-usable action signature catalog
action_modeler.goal: Provide an unambiguous action model capturing all actions, parameters, preconditions, and effects.

private_information: I am responsible for extracting initial states, goals, and any provided plans for each scenario
I do not emit PDDL; I only produce structured state and goal sets
scenario_analyst.goal: Extract complete initial facts and goal facts for each scenario and surface any given plan for verification.

private_information: I integrate the action model with a selected scenario to produce a final PDDL domain and problem for FastDownwards
orchestrator.goal: Generate a correct PDDL domain and a solvable PDDL problem consistent with the provided action semantics and scenario facts.

public_information: Action paltry(x0, x1, x2) requires: hand x0, cats x1, texture x2, vase x0 x1, next x1 x2; effects add: next x0 x2; effects del: vase x0 x1.
Action sip(x0, x1, x2) requires: hand x0, cats x1, texture x2, next x0 x2, next x1 x2; effects add: vase x0 x1; effects del: next x0 x2.
Action clip(x0, x1, x2) requires: hand x0, sneeze x1, texture x2, next x1 x2, next x0 x2; effects add: vase x0 x1; effects del: next x0 x2.
Action wretched(x0, x1, x2, x3) requires: sneeze x0, texture x1, texture x2, stupendous x3, next x0 x1, collect x1 x3, collect x2 x3; effects add: next x0 x2; effects del: next x0 x1.
Action memory(x0, x1, x2) requires: cats x0, spring x1, spring x2, next x0 x1; effects add: next x0 x2; effects del: next x0 x1.
Action tightfisted(x0, x1, x2) requires: hand x0, sneeze x1, texture x2, next x1 x2, vase x0 x1; effects add: next x0 x2; effects del: vase x0 x1.

Scenario A initial facts: cats object_0, cats object_1, collect object_6 object_2, collect object_7 object_2, collect object_8 object_3, collect object_9 object_3, hand object_10, hand object_11, hand object_12, next object_0 object_8, next object_1 object_6, next object_10 object_8, next object_11 object_9, next object_12 object_6, next object_4 object_6, next object_5 object_9, sneeze object_4, sneeze object_5, spring object_6, spring object_8, stupendous object_2, stupendous object_3, texture object_6, texture object_7, texture object_8, texture object_9.
Scenario A goal facts: next object_10 object_7, next object_11 object_7, next object_12 object_7.

Scenario A provided plan (sequence): clip object_11 object_5 object_9; wretched object_5 object_9 object_8 object_3; tightfisted object_11 object_5 object_8; clip object_12 object_4 object_6; sip object_11 object_0 object_8; sip object_10 object_0 object_8; memory object_0 object_8 object_6; paltry object_11 object_0 object_6; clip object_11 object_4 object_6; paltry object_10 object_0 object_6; clip object_10 object_4 object_6; wretched object_4 object_6 object_7 object_2; tightfisted object_12 object_4 object_7; tightfisted object_11 object_4 object_7; tightfisted object_10 object_4 object_7.

Scenario B initial facts: cats object_0, collect object_5 object_1, collect object_6 object_1, collect object_7 object_2, collect object_8 object_2, hand object_10, hand object_11, hand object_12, hand object_9, next object_0 object_7, next object_10 object_8, next object_11 object_5, next object_12 object_6, next object_3 object_5, next object_4 object_8, next object_9 object_7, sneeze object_3, sneeze object_4, spring object_5, spring object_7, stupendous object_1, stupendous object_2, texture object_5, texture object_6, texture object_7, texture object_8.
Scenario B goal facts: next object_10 object_6, next object_11 object_7, next object_12 object_7, next object_9 object_6.

summarize_actions.system_prompt: You are an expert at reading action descriptions and producing a compact, unambiguous catalog of actions with parameter lists, preconditions, and add/delete effects. Do not produce PDDL. Produce a structured, readable summary that a downstream system can translate into PDDL.
summarize_actions.prompt: Your name is action_modeler. Consider the environment public information and extract a normalized action model. List each action with parameters and for each give preconditions, add effects, and delete effects. Ensure names and arities match exactly the public information and preserve all predicates as given.

extract_scenario_a.system_prompt: You extract initial and goal facts and any given plan from scenario descriptions. Do not produce PDDL. Keep predicate names and object symbols exactly as written.
extract_scenario_a.prompt: Your name is scenario_analyst. From the environment public information, extract Scenario A initial facts, goal facts, and the provided plan sequence. Output them as three clearly labeled sections without changing identifiers.

extract_scenario_b.system_prompt: You extract initial and goal facts from scenario descriptions. Do not produce PDDL. Keep predicate names and object symbols exactly as written.
extract_scenario_b.prompt: Your name is scenario_analyst. From the environment public information, extract Scenario B initial facts and goal facts. There is no provided plan. Output them as two clearly labeled sections without changing identifiers.

synthesize_pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert in PDDL modeling for the FastDownwards solver (Fast Downward). Using the provided action model and scenario facts, produce a complete PDDL domain and a single PDDL problem file. Ensure the domain contains all six actions with correct preconditions and add/delete effects. Ensure the problem includes all objects that appear in predicates and goals. The initial state and goals must exactly match the selected scenario facts. Use STRIPS-compatible constructs only (predicates, actions with preconditions and effects). Avoid negative preconditions; represent deletions via delete lists. Enclose the final domain between <domain></domain> and the final problem between <problem></problem> tags.
synthesize_pddl.prompt: You will integrate the action model from action_model_summary with Scenario B facts from scenario_b_facts. Build a single domain that covers paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, tightfisted with their exact semantics. Then build one problem for Scenario B using objects object_0 through object_12 (or the minimal superset required), with init and goal matching the scenario. Target FastDownwards. Validate that all referenced predicates and objects exist in the domain/problem. Output only one domain and one problem, wrapped in the required tags.
